channel.title: Radio First
channel.itunes:author: Radioplayer
channel.itunes:summary: A monthly podcast from Radioplayer Worldwide LTD, where we highlight the latest news and innovations in radio and we discuss – how to keep radio first in connected cars and beyond.
channel.description: A monthly podcast from Radioplayer Worldwide LTD, where we highlight the latest news and innovations in radio and we discuss – how to keep radio first in connected cars and beyond.

item.title: Pilot: Where Radioplayer Stands – and Where the Dashboard Is Heading
item.description:
Radioplayer’s debut episode sets the scene for a pivotal year.
• CEO Yann Legarson reveals where the broadcaster-led platform is growing next. • Laurence Harrison recaps the live demo of Radioplayer’s new in-car prototype—hybrid radio with restart and app-linking. • Special guests Tomas Granryd (SR) and Tobias Nielsen (Bauer Media) explain the new RadioReady framework that unites broadcasters and automakers.
If you want to know how radio will stay first in connected cars—and why 16 car brands are already on board—start here.
